des: "I searched everywhere for a coconut syrup recipe like I enjoyed while I was in Hawaii.  When every recipe I tried failed to satisfy me, I was compelled to create my own."
ins: Whisk together the coconut milk and cornstarch in a saucepan until the cornstarch is dissolved. Pour in the corn syrup, sugar, and coconut; bring to a boil, stirring continually. As soon as the mixture comes to a rolling boil, remove from heat. Allow to cool completely before serving.
